attributes.review: Before I even talk about the app, it makes you pay at least 50 DOLLARS before signing up! And when you do, you get kicked out!! Do NOT download this app, it is a scam, it’ll make you pay money and just kick you out! Not to mention I entered the app and saw a BURNT POTATO. It was the scariest thing I’ve ever seen. And there’s a review on this app that talks about a umpa loompa that is a hot Cheeto? THATS TRUE. This is by far the WORST app in the App Store, and I think that it needs to be removed.
attributes.title: they said they were gonna “make America greater again”

attributes.review: Look, I don’t know what all these weird reviews are about, but all I wanted was to enjoy an app and try to see the views of our president that I respectfully disagree with in every way possible. However, I think it gave my phone some kind of bug. I downloaded it and it kept crashing and then my phone would just shut off on its own. It’s really unfortunate, but what are ya gonna do. I mean what did I expect from someone who doesn’t care about the wellbeing of others in general
attributes.title: Just bad

attributes.review: This app kills🔪🩸 puppies🐶 . I downloaded this app to support my sponge 🧽 , and when I opened it my dog 🐶 died🔪🩸 . I noticed that every time I used the app another one of my dogs 🐶 would drop dead 💀 . I don’t understand why my squishy💦squiggling sponge🧽would want to hurt🔪my puppies🐶, and continued using it thinking it was just coincidence. But then on Friday sponge🧽 showed up at my door step clothed👕👖in my dead💀 dogs🐶 carcasses. I was so appalled🤮 that I immediately deleted🚫the app. ❌Do NOT❌download this app unless you want sponge🧽 to kill your dogs🐶.

The app is super buggy and will rarely send me updates on the Trump campaign. And when it does work it zaps my battery life faster then face time. I also don’t understand why it keeps crashing every five seconds. Plus to make matters even worse now the app won’t even open. I’ve tried everything to fix this from powering my phone off completely to uninstalling then reinstalling the app. So I’m sad to say I will not be using this app again.
attributes.title: I can’t even open the app

attributes.review: The moment I opened this horrible app, my long furby passes away 😢 now I know you are probably thinking “oh it was just really bad timing” NO Atticus Goodjoke Beetleglee was as healthy as my left pinky toe. This app is as cursed as my fyp page 🥺that’s not the only thing that’s wrong with this app tho. Every time I open it I’m brought to another dimension filled with nothing but cream cheese and Hannah Montana memorabilia! Could be a lot worse but still very confusing :( anyways I gotta go wash my grandmas hair (and I don’t mean the hair on her head...) ttylxox <3
attributes.title: RIP

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and first off, it took 5 weeks for it to download!! While it was downloading, all my other apps kept freezing!!! My phone even shut off once!!! That’s not all! Once I FINALLY got the app ( a month and some later) it kept sending me notifications about how trump doesn’t support BLM and how people of color are a disgrace to the US and so much more!!!😡 when I thought it was done my phone got 15 VIRUSES!!! I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE AND NUMBER TO RESET IT!!!!!!!!! Never again!! This is a warning !!!!! 😭😡😡😡
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded it to see what the president was talking about🤩So they told me to vote for him and I said no💔So they called me a negro and said “get back to yo plantation”😔They even kidnapped my two dogs and put me against my will🤚🏽I said OKAY OKAY just STOP🙄So they have me my dogs back but I still didn’t vote for Trump🤣and they threaten to send me to Africa so I said “SEND ME THEN”🤗And now I am currently located in Nigeria bc of this app🤧So Please don’t download it‼️And also😺IM NEVER voting for the cheeto chimpanzee party palooza..........t “president”🚪Last time I checked my president is Obama💞
attributes.title: THIS APP WILL HACK YOU😋‼️

attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!
attributes.title: 🌸🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕😋

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible! I opened the app and it immediately asked for my phone number, which I entered in. The app has now been spamming me with text messages for the two days I’ve had it. I even deleted the app, but it is still sending me text messages. Also, my sister downloaded it as well, and it completely broke her phone. We’re not sure exactly what it did, but ever since she got the app her phone won’t turn on, so she has to get a new one. In conclusion, DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: Do not download! This app took three months to download. I do not recommend! Even if Trump thinks he can make American great again just don’t take TikTok down. Please, I just almost hit my goal and now I’m very 😡 I am just very mad because TikTok is one of the most successful in the one most popular apps on the App Store. So many people all over the world love making content and looking through all the content. I bet Charli D’Amelio would be very very sad if you took TikTok down. He is just an orange person!😡🙄
attributes.title: This is horrific 🙄😡
